name: DLink | DxS | Environment | Temperature Out of Range (SYSLOG)
description: WARN: Temperatrue Sensor:2 enter alarm state.(current temperatrue:0)

patterns.value_re: (?:WARN:|WARN\(4\))( Unit \d+)? (?P<name>Temperat(?:ur|ru)e Sensor:\s*\d+) enter alarm state.\s*\(current temperat(?:ur|ru)e:\s*(?P<measure>\d+)\)

name: DLink | DxS | Environment | Temperature Returned to Normal Range (SYSLOG)
description: Temperatrue Sensor:2 recovers to normal state.(current temperatrue:37)
event_class__name: Environment | Temperature Returned to Normal Range

patterns.value_re: (?:INFO:|INFO\(6\))( Unit \d+)? (?P<name>Temperat(?:ur|ru)e Sensor:\s*\d+) recovers to normal state.\s*\(current temperat(?:ur|ru)e:\s*(?P<measure>\d+)\)
